messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Holodeck - 1218 AD.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Toke Observatory LIX. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Warning blob has reached mass of 100

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: friendly reminder that the shuttle will not leave untill the blob is destroyed

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we hope that you guys will remeber the shuttle won't leave untill the blob is destroyed

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we hoped you remebered have a nice day

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to your utter incompetence and failure to contain a simple blob we are sending an ERT team to assist you

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: CRITICAL MASS HAVE A NICE DAY
